text: (nabiyē!) ahashi siṭinnanda, bhūmiyehi siṭinnanda, sūryayāda, candrayāda, tārukāda, kan̆duda, gasda, satunda, minisungen bohomayak denāda niyata vaśayenma allāhṭa sujūd kara, namadinnāha yanna oba nodækkehida? ehet væḍideneku mata dan̆ḍuvamama niyama viya. kavurunva allāh avaman karannēda, ohuva kisiveku visin hō gaurava kaḷa nohæka. niyata vaśayenma allāh taman adahas karana dæyama karannēya
